values:
[May. 1st, 2007|01:10 pm]
100 bucks says this Clowney dude we drafted tears up lambeau and catches favres 421st touchdown pass.


Where's my hundo, Yingling?

it's my birthday. this is what i have received: except framed and autographed from yingling


a whole bunch of these and one of these

and this

from my girlfriend

and this

from nathan

i've seen the sun both come up and go down everyday for about a week now. i seriously think that i have a problem. i seriously cannot sleep. i've tried but it doesn't work. i don't know what to do.

even booze doesn't work.
does anyone want to go get pizza and beers?

Nintendo is back on the good list. Apparently, it works just like any other call center. You can get someone who knows what they're doing or someone who sucks. I got someone who sucks... Amy got someone who does their job. 

Anyway...
I have to send my wii in for them to fix. Wii Play broke it apparently.

Wii-less 8-12 business days. Fuck that.

Winter went really quick this year. I know it's not over but a week of above 35 degree weather in February? Crazy.

Yesterday I turned on my Wii and ALL of my Virtual Console games were gone (as well as my Internet Browser channel. It was way too late to call Nintendo customer service so I waited until today. Got a hold of Greg at Nintendo customer service today who, to make a long story short, told me I'm out of luck with the VC games and will have to buy them all again. They can send me a new Wii since this one is freezing. I also forgot to add that I got mine on launch day and that one was broken (it wouldn't perform a system update). I told him no for now. I'll call back. I'm going to have a girl call because somehow they're better at getting what they want than dudes are.

Update after that.

I probably should have done this a while ago.

Anyway...
if you have a Wii and want to be Wii friends my # is 4393 5739 8737 7018. 

Awesome.

If anyone wants to have more fun than ever....

I have off all week and will be playing Wii all day, all week.
Everything about Dan's birthday was awesome except for Jessie cutting me off at The Riverhorse.
the new Just a Fire rules

I just found out very recently that I'm ridiculous, childish and possibly even hypocritical. Give me a fuckin break.  if you can only talk about shit on livejournal don't talk about shit. and if you're only gonna talk about "friends" on livejournal don't talk about "friends." you don't give a fuck anyway. please do not comment on here.
cactus club was supposed to be nothing but a good time tonight. instead, i witnessed one of the most ridiculous things i have ever seen. sometimes people aren't what they seem to be.

so last thursday i almost went over a moutainside during an ice storm in pennsylvania in one of these... the only thing that saved my life was a guard rail. i never thought those things would do that much if you slammed into it. but it did and im glad. otherwise... peace out mike. im in appleton and will be for a while. if anybody is ever up here feel free to call me and hang. i will be at claire's house for about 2 weeks. i sweat all the time for no reason. it really bugs me.

Julie Wager!!!  

Two of my good friends that just moved to Minneapolis and are staying with friends until february.  I may have also heard that you're going to move to Minneapolis in Feb.  If you're looking for kick ass room mates these two girls are kick ass.  Let me know if you are at all interested and I'll get you guys hooked up for the next time you're in the 'Apolis.  They both work at this kick ass restaurant, too.

Heart,
Mike

sorry...
but i'm never coming back to milwaukee.  give me your hate but i don't care.

dear mike,
you're never going to feel better.  seriously.
love, 
life (and the world)


dear life,
i hate you.
love,
mike

what's better than having the flu?  having to get your wisdom teeth out 2 adys after you recover.  

and i'm never going home again because there's a rabid alley dog that lives there now.
rain rain go away so mike can make some muthafuckin scrilla!!!!!

i can barely talk.  it hurts way too much to swallow.  my whole body aches.  i can't eat anything.  i have a fever but i'm constantly cold.  half of my head won't stop pounding.  i haven't left my house in 2 days.  the only time i left my room/bed was to let rachel in to take care of me and watch o brother where art thou with her.  

this seriously sucks.  i can't remember the last time i felt this bad.  maybe 5th grade?

other awesome news...
my car rolled over 150,000 miles and decided to stop working (not totally, but mostly)

this sucks.
all my friends are pussies.  nobodoy came to kid 606 except rachel and her friend cara.  it was fucking crazy.
kid 606 tomorrow at onopa!  everyone should come its gonna be fucking insane.

Everybody that hung out with me for my birthday is boss.  

Amber is awesome for the picture of me and the praying hands.  If I had a scanner or a functioning digital camera I would post them.  

Megan is awesome for the Aveda shaving cream that I like so much!!

Dan is awesome for 80 million drinks.

Rachel is awesome for 90 million drinks and being kickass for always.

Amanda is awesome for 40 million drinks and her approval.

Finally...
I'm awesome.    



...and Euphone rulez #1

rachel...

if you read this and need a ride home from work (i saw that your car was still dead) you can call me anytime and let me know because i'll be up ALL night.
from now on i only listen to Kid 606. fucking insane.
last night i lost 6 out of 6 games of pool.  i am amazingly bad at pool.

75 cent monster and vodkas at THE FIRE ALARM (!!!???) in Appletowne last night.  Amazing.  Nothing better than the mother and daughter dancing team that Jesse was dancing with for a while.  I, on the other hand, wasted my time talking to the only good looking girl (the bartender who had a boyfriend).  Why I didn't talk to ma and daughter I'll never know.  I ended up talking movies with some bro and he said "Name any 2 actor/actresses from ANY movie post 1990 and I can name it."  He also told me that he has never lost at this.  Some guy tried to stump him for 5 hours one time.  I shot the first one off right as it came to me... "Christian Slater and Patricia Arquette."  

"Uhh.... I'm not good with Christian Slater movies."

Give me a fuckin break.  And give my car some, too.

#1 I blew it with a girl at the Riverhorse tonight

#2 I gave a crack head a ride to a crack house

dudes...  and chicks...

seriously.  

fucking PEE WEE is back.  this man is no friend of mine... he is a late 30 to early 40's dude from the ghetto who when i met him told me that he had just gotten out of jail and needed a ride to the other side of the tracks (which means THE HOOD). this guy caused me so much trouble about 3-4 years ago when i lived on bartlett (east side, what).  list of bullshit?  sure...

- stabbed someone and tried to wash his hands at my house
- tried to stab my friend
- made me give him rides so he could buy crack
- made me give him money (15- 35 cents at a time) so he could buy hits of crack
- brought a hooker over to my house as a favor because we were all such great friends (we obviously made them leave)
- told me that his cousin stole my 200 some dollar package of clothes off my front porch
- after yingling said "what the fuck!?!" to the aforementioned event he freaked out and we thought he was gonna shoot us but eventually just challenged us all to a push-up contest

these are just some of the events that i can remember.  i don't think livejournal has a big enough server for me to list everything.  this sucks... he live right across the street from me.

ahhh... 
i got stabbed in the eye by a pine tree today and now my left eye won't stop crying or hurting.  normal people would go to the doctor and they would fix in 2 seconds but i can't do that because I don't have insurance and don't want to pay 8 billion dollars.  
life.
who wants to go see neil diamond on july 28th (MY BIRTHDAY)?  i'm going and i don't care if i have to go by myself.
i was wrong about dave kiley.  they tested him and they were wrong.  shitty

One of my best friends in the world, David Kiley, just found out what the undiagnosable disease that has plagued him for the last 4 years is. It's called Porphyria. At least he can finally get treatment and not have to go to the hospital all the time. More on Porphyria

so the girl i almost got married to just called me out of nowhere after over a year of not talking.  it's awesome that no matter how bad you can feel something will always come along to make it fucking worse.

Kristin and Nick!!!  I'm gonna be in Appleton this weekend for my sister's gradumatation.  Let's hang out!!  Happy Birthday Kristin!!!!     !!!

Love, Mike

i hate the firebird band (don't ever go see them).  i kinda like the city of madison.  and i love the gilmore girls.  yes.





buy the new HERBALSIER!!!  www.herbalsier.com  www.ninjatune.net

so i was in the beasement about 10 minutes ago playing the drums and dan came downstairs to freestyle over my sexy beats. he turned on the PA and there was the biggest wasp i've ever seen right next to his head. we're in the process of killing it right now but we're both too scared to go downstairs. if i didn't know mark sheppard i think i would lose my mind...
anyone that lives in chicago should come to the empty bottle tonight for tornavalance and call me lightning and tight phantomz.  it's free.

with all this battles talk did anyone actually watch prefuse 73?  dude is sick.  empty bottle has awesome sound.  

i don't suck at having a girlfriend anymore.  i'm awesome.
does anyone want to tell me why i suck at having a girlfriend?  that would be sweet.
Does anyone want to go see Sharon Jones with me at Onopa tonight?  I know it's at Onopa and that sucks but I'm going anyway.
When is Milwaukee gonna get a Jamba Juice?  Seriously.  I need to start spending 8 bucks a day on something besides Red Bull.

i can't stop spending less than 50 bucks at bars and part of my tooth just fell out of my head.  
this sucks.  
man did i have a valentine's day.  my valentine (which wasn't mark as i previously thought it would be) and i ate at EL AZTECA and at the end of the meal some dude came over and gave us each a TRIPLE shot of Don Julio.  we drank them but it was rough.  then we went to the fly and i tried to call my good pal Davey J. Kiley because he had no idea that i was in his hood.  I had to borrow Corrine's phone because mine doesn't work in that bomb shelter of a bar.  I forgot that she still has a 414 number and not a 920 so i called his number without an area code.  some girl answered and i thought it was someone at Dave's answering and messing with me because he didn't recognize the number.  after 5 minutes of arguing with "karen" about this i finally realized my mistake and apologized.  actually i said, "FINE. Sorry." and hung up.  then i proceeded to spend 60 dollars (american) and carry Corrine back upstairs (i carried her downstairs, too).  then later i had to break up a fight because the bouncer at the fly is small.  they ask me to break up fights at a lot of bars that i go to.  it mostly ends up with me knowing the bouncers are on my side so i talk tons and tons of shit.  that's how this one ended, too.  

i'm gonna eat an orange... i might have scurvy.

Digital Lions

Somehow Im still alive

I hope everyone had a good Christmas.  I haven't but there's still half a day to go.  I wish people would just respect my choices for once.  Ahh..  Enough of that... It's Christmas.  Ok..  

If anyone wants to go with me to see Rjd2 on New Years Eve and stay in a hotel in downtown Chicago until the 2nd let me know.  I'm trying to find a girl to go but since I know for a fact that won't happen I guess some sort of dude can go, too.  Lame.

Ok,
Mike
